channel.title: Swedish Tech Events (Stockholm)

item.title: 2021-06-29 17:30 Teaser: Kubernetes - West Forest Tech meetup
item.description: Kubernetes is an open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management. It was originally designed by Google, and is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Mikael is a consultant at West Forest Techno...

item.description: Welcome Employers and Job Seekers! Whether you are looking for a job or recruiting, Tech Job Fair is the place to be! The speed dating event for recruiting! Come to meet employers, ask questions, and make connections. This event will target local job seekers from...

item.title: 2021-06-06 11:00 Säkerhetskryssning 2020 - Dataföreningen Meet&Learn Stockholmskretsen
item.description: SÄKERHETSKRYSSNINGEN SENARELÄGGS PGA COVID-19 Tyvärr måste vi flytta fram datumet för konferensen ytterligare pga det rådande läget med covid-19. Säkerhetskryssningen som skulle äga rum 6-8 september 2020 kommer istället genomföras 6-8 juni 2021. Uppdateringar och mer informat...
